subtitle: Fantasy Football & Prediction Markets

ios.description:
PULL Fantasy combines the best of fantasy football with prediction markets. Create or join leagues, draft players through snake or auction formats, and trade your way to a championship—all while betting on matchups, player props, and league outcomes with real-time odds.

FEATURES:

• Full Fantasy Football Platform
  - Snake, auction, and keeper draft formats
  - PPR, Half PPR, and Standard scoring
  - Real-time scoring updates
  - Waiver wire with FAAB bidding
  - Trade proposals with AI-powered analysis
  - Commissioner tools and league management

• Prediction Markets
  - Bet on weekly matchups and player props
  - LMSR-powered odds that update in real-time
  - Portfolio tracking and P&L analytics
  - Market creation for commissioners

• AI-Powered Insights
  - Draft recommendations and tier rankings
  - Start/sit decisions backed by projections
  - Trade value analysis
  - Waiver wire priority suggestions
  - Lineup optimization

• Social Features
  - League chat with trash talk
  - Public league finder
  - Weekly and season recaps
  - Power rankings and awards
  - Referral bonuses

• Real-Time Updates
  - Live scoring during games
  - Injury alerts and news feed
  - Push notifications for trades, waivers, and your pick
  - WebSocket-powered instant updates

android.shortDescription: Fantasy football with prediction markets. Draft, trade, bet, and win your league.
android.fullDescription:
PULL Fantasy combines the best of fantasy football with prediction markets. Create or join leagues, draft players through snake or auction formats, and trade your way to a championship—all while betting on matchups, player props, and league outcomes with real-time odds.

KEY FEATURES:

★ FULL FANTASY FOOTBALL
Snake drafts, auction drafts, keeper leagues, dynasty formats. PPR, Half PPR, and Standard scoring. Real-time scoring, waiver wire with FAAB, and comprehensive trade tools.

★ PREDICTION MARKETS
Bet on weekly matchups, player props, and league outcomes. LMSR-powered odds update in real-time. Track your portfolio and P&L.

★ AI ASSISTANT
Get draft recommendations, start/sit decisions, trade analysis, and lineup optimization powered by advanced AI models.

★ SOCIAL & CHAT
League chat, public league finder, weekly recaps, power rankings, and achievements. Connect with friends and talk trash all season.

★ REAL-TIME EVERYTHING
Live scoring, injury alerts, push notifications, and WebSocket-powered instant updates keep you in the action.
